alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 3:58AM PST until January 11 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Areas of blowing dust near dry lake beds. * WHERE...Eastern Mojave Desert, Morongo Basin, Owens Valley, and Western Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From noon today to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing dust could reduce visibility to below a mile. Crosswinds along Highway 395 in the Owens Valley could result in hazardous driving conditions for high-profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high-profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects such as trampolines and garbage cans.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert
